import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Companies() { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const companies = [ { id: 1, name: 'Beauty Shop', category: 'Красота', bonusPercent: 5, image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/150', }, { id: 2, name: 'Coffee House', category: 'Рестораны', bonusPercent: 3, image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/150', }, { id: 3, name: 'Health Center', category: 'Здоровье', bonusPercent: 7, image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/150', }, { id: 4, name: 'Fashion Store', category: 'Магазины', bonusPercent: 4, image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/150', }, ]; const filteredCompanies = companies.filter(company => company.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || company.category.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); return (

Компании-партнеры

setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{filteredCompanies.map((company) => (

{company.name}

{company.category}

{company.bonusPercent}% бонусов
))}
); } export default Companies;
